ygData.subject: Re: Ice Comet
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Proof by example is the best way to go.  After saving my party a few times, and also saving some strangers that were getting beat up, I have convinced a
ygData.messageBody:
> Agreed. Excellent tactics for wizards with
> brains..........but other party
> members need brains and have to think like that too. We
> KNOW we are useful
> to parties but we have to convince them we are.

Proof by example is the best way to go. After saving my party a few
times, and also saving some strangers that were getting beat up, I
have convinced a good amount of people that a smart wizard is
valuable.
But I know that a lot of our class aren't great proof...
Aznyin
Level 15 Erudite Wizard
Chivalric Order of Norrath
Current Residence: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]
